definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: a third part (so Targum [[תֻלְּתָ־]], [[תַּלְתָּא]], Syr. tuwlto0, Nab. [[תלת]] SAC:121, Ar. 3ul3un, 3ul3un, As. šulultu (= šuluštu) Meissn:Suppl. 95, cf. Dl:WB; v. also M:88 * Dr:Da 5:7);—emph. [[תַּלְתָּא]] adv. as one of three Da 5:16, Da 5:29 (Bev the third day, every three days, v. So in M:88 *).
